def has_bathtub():
    # Check if there is a bathtub in the area
    symbol has_bathtub=exists o: item : is_bathtub(o)
    return has_bathtub

behavior prepare_bathtub(bathtub: item):
    body:
        observe(bathtub, "Prepare bathtub for cats shower")
        # Observe if the bathtub is suitable for the cats shower

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if has_bathtub():
            # If there is a known bathtub, prepare it
            bind bathtub: item where:
                is_bathtub(bathtub)
            achieve close_char(char, bathtub)
            prepare_bathtub(bathtub)

        else:
            # If no known bathtub is found, search for one
            foreach bathtub: item:
                if is_bathtub(bathtub) and not visited(bathtub):
                    observe(bathtub, "Check and prepare the bathtub for the cats shower")
